      • menu

        public void menu(java.util.List<Trainee> traineeList)
        This the main menu Operations start from here which are signup login and exist
        Parameters:
        traineeList - List: Created mock data program

      • signup

        public Trainee signup()
        Takes all necessary parameters for signup Name, Age, Gender, Email and Password from user. First, checks whether any fields are empty then checks if anybody has the same email. If anybody has same email it does not allow to register. (I assume that cannot be the email dublicate in the system)
        Returns:
        Trainee

      • login

        public boolean login(java.util.List<Trainee> traineeList,
                     Trainee person)
        Takes 2 input from user, email and password it searches inputs inside trainee list using authenticate helper method. If returned object not null, it updates person object. otherwise returns null;
        Parameters:
        traineeList - List: Created mock data program
        person - Trainee: logged in user inside mock data
        Returns:
        boolean

      • addCourse

        public Trainee addCourse(Trainee person,
                         java.util.List<Course> courseList,
                         java.lang.String courseName)
        It searchs name of the course inside courseList when it finds, adds to the enrolled courses. Otherwise give error messages
        Parameters:
        person - Trainee: logged in user inside mock data
        courseList - List
        courseName - String: name of the course that going to added
        Returns:
        Trainee

      • deleteCourse

        public Trainee deleteCourse(Trainee person,
                            java.lang.String courseName)
        It searchs inside enrolled courses. If it finds it, deletes the course: Otherwise displays error message
        Parameters:
        person - Trainee: logged in user inside mock data
        courseName - String: name of the course that going to be deleted
        Returns:
        Trainee

      • getInstructorDetails

        public void getInstructorDetails(int ID,
                                 java.util.List<Instructor> instructorList)
        checks whether Id match within the instructor list if matchs, displays the instructor. otherwise displays error message
        Parameters:
        ID - Integer: search instructor by id
        instructorList - List Trainee: Created mock data program

      • changeToPremium

        public Trainee changeToPremium(Trainee person)
        It changes the person's premium status. If the person already premium or cancel the operation it displays messages accordingly
        Parameters:
        person - Trainee: logged in user inside mock data
        Returns:
        Trainee

      • logout

        public boolean logout(Trainee person,
                      java.util.List<Trainee> traineeList)
        When user wants to logout, first finds the person in traineeList then gets it, and updates it.
        Parameters:
        person - Trainee: logged in user inside mock data
        traineeList - List: Created mock data program

      • subMenu

        public void subMenu(Trainee person)
        It is a submenu. Apart from login, signup and exit methods, other operations run here.
        Parameters:
        person - Trainee: logged in user inside mock datax
